tweet.text:
Been using QMD (github. com/tobi/qmd) to search my Obsidian vault and PDFs with natural language.

Runs locally. No API costs. No data leaving my machine.

Point it at a folder, ask questions, get answers with sources.

The real unlock: hooked it up to Claude Code. Now when I'm https://t.co/DzWbKv3zxS
